alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 10:56AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Wisconsin, south central Wisconsin and southeast Wisconsin, including the following counties, in east central Wisconsin, Fond du Lac. In south central Wisconsin, Columbia, Green Lake and Marquette. In southeast Wisconsin, Dodge. * WHEN...Until 145 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1053 AM CDT, While heavy rain has moved east small stream flooding remains possible through the morning hours. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fond Du Lac, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Waupun, Ripon, Berlin, Mayville, Horicon, Juneau, Lomira, Randolph, Markesan, Theresa, Princeton, Hustisford, Oakfield, Rosendale, Green Lake, Iron Ridge and Brandon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette
